completeness.description: Extent to which the task has been fully executed based on the specified goals and steps

correctness.description: Accuracy of the information retrieved and the final answer provided

reasoning_trace.description: Availability and clarity of the logical steps taken by the multi-agent system to arrive at the solution

compliance_with_instructions.description: Adherence to the initial instructions and steps outlined for the task

resolution_time.description: Total time taken by the multi-agent system from start to finish to complete the task

resource_efficiency.description: Efficiency in the use of computational and informational resources during task execution

diversity_of_sources.description: Variety and trustworthiness of sources used to gather information

response_clarity.description: How clearly and understandably the answer is conveyed
